result.title: This year,my way,from gray to yellow
result.content:
First, congratulations ,to all CF members, the New Year!

Maybe,this blog  will be boring for you,but I have a wish to share with you impressions from this year's contests.Everything started slowly,I was only newbie and I didn't see how I can improve my programming skills.Always I spent all  time to solve one or two problem on the contests.However I was sure that I will succeed on our country competition,and then BUM!I didn't pass the Regional cometition!I was near the border,but had 10 points less!

After that I started to work harder,I learned some algorithms,I learned some data structures(BIT,Heap,Segment Tree,dsu...) and I had a lot of codeforces competitions where I can get new experience.Also,one important thing in all contests is hacking.On every competition I thought about some special cases and watching other codes.I won points and also I saw some good ways to implement solution.


Now,I know that a long way front of me.I will continue to work and I hope that one day become red!
In my country competitons haven't start yet,but I hope I can at least pass the regional competition :) I will try to solve some harder problems and show that I deserve yellow.
I'd like to mention If Codeforces team let,my friend and I are going organize one CF round!

Thanks for reading,and I hope that  people who are currently weaker than me get one more motive to work.
